imdb.plot outline: Welcome to the NFL Playoffs, also known as the "second" season. Now the Playoff action is available for digital stream or download. Each week, you can follow all of the action with a complete set of game highlights and expert analysis from NFL Network.
imdb.title: NFL Playoffs
plot: Welcome to the _NFL Playoffs_ (qv), also known as the "second" season. Now the Playoff action is available for digital stream or download. Each week, you can follow all of the action with a complete set of game highlights and expert analysis from NFL Network.
